notes.text:
This update for libxml2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-39615: Fixed crafted xml can cause global buffer overflow (bsc#1214768).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: ** DISPUTED ** Xmlsoft Libxml2 v2.11.0 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read via the xmlSAX2StartElement() function at /libxml2/SAX2.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via supplying a crafted XML file. NOTE: the vendor's position is that the product does not support the legacy SAX1 interface with custom callbacks; there is a crash even without crafted input.
notes.title: CVE description
